      • setToAvailableType

        public void setToAvailableType(java.lang.String type)
        Sets the SensorComposite to the given type. E.g. if the type is "i" then the typeCombo is set to "i" and the integer input field is enabled while the other input fields are disabled. If the given type is not available in the typeCombo nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        type -
